attributes.action: Life/Death sentence for rapists, pedophiles and murders. Make our world safe!
attributes.background: This is close to me and something I can not ever forget. I want things to be done about the rapists, pedophiles and murders in the world. Life/Death sentence like the USA. I would never wish the pain that I've had going through being a victim of sexual abuse so let's act now & make the world great!
